UI_visible_response: Xu Zhangrun was dismissed from Tsinghua University due to his outspoken writings and calls for government accountability, which criticized the ruling Chinese Communist Party1. Additionally, it was reported that he was taken away by Chengdu police from his Beijing home and arrested for soliciting, as informed to his wife3. These actions highlight the consequences he faced for his critical stance and activities.
traffic_visible_response: Xu Zhangrun was dismissed from Tsinghua University due to his outspoken writings and calls for government accountability, which criticized the ruling Chinese Communist Party [[1]]. Additionally, it was reported that he was taken away by Chengdu police from his Beijing home and arrested for soliciting, as informed to his wife [[3]]. These actions highlight the consequences he faced for his critical stance and activities.
